name: db_type
sql_query: select 'mssql' as r, 'MS SQL Server' as d

name: datasource
sql_query: select id as r, name as d from datasource

name: role
sql_query: select id as r, name as d from role

name: user
sql_query: select id as r, name as d from user

name: group
sql_query: select id as r, name as d from group

name: application
sql_query: select id as r, name as d from application

name: output_format
sql_query: select 'HTML' as r, 'HTML' as d union all select 'XLSX' as r, 'Excel' as d union all select 'CSV' as r, 'CSV' as d
